ONEUS

Introduction

Hwanwoong is a South Korean singer under RBW. He is a member of the boy group ONEUS.

In 2017, Hwanwoong was a contestant on MNET' survival show Produce 101 Season 2, where he was eliminated after ranking 42nd.

He debuted as a member of ONEUS on January 9, 2019 with the release of their first mini album "Light Us".
